name: ANTC
author: LCApps
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' data: https://source.unsplash.com https://images.unsplash.com https://api.openweathermap.org ; script-src 'self' https://source.unsplash.com https://images.unsplash.com https://api.openweathermap.org ; object-src 'self' https://source.unsplash.com https://images.unsplash.com https://api.openweathermap.org ; style-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' data: https://source.unsplash.com https://images.unsplash.com https://api.openweathermap.org
